headline: Tim Cook Gifts Trump 24-Karat Gold-Based Plaque After Winning Exemption From 100% Chip Tariff
summary: Apple CEO Tim Cook on Wednesday presented President Donald Trump with a one-of-a-kind, U.S.-made glass plaque and walked away with an assurance that Apple's expanding "American Manufacturing Program" will spare the company from a looming 100% tariff on imported semiconductors and chips. What Happened: Cook handed Trump a circular slab of Corning Gorilla Glass etched with the presidential seal and Cook's signature, mounted on a 24-karat-gold base fabricated in Utah. "It is a unique unit of one,"
